title: How to learn ReactJS?
content: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language JavaScript is the programming language of the Web javascript is easy to learn.
ponit1: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components.
ponit2: It is maintained by Meta and a community of individual developers and companies.
titleEnd: Perfect for learning how the reactjs works, prototyping a new idea, or creating a demo to share online.
